medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper

text: Settō Shi Hakkon 節頭司伯根, Saitō Izu-no-Nyūdō Ryūhon 佐井藤伊豆入道立尊, Satō Kiyomasa 佐藤清正.
title: Mashiba, the Tairyō, Subjugates Korea
